name: Balon Greyjoy
text: Pillage. Renown. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a card in an opponent's discard pile and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, shuffle it into its owner's deck. Errata from FAQ v2.0

flavor: "You serve one god, Damphair, but I have served ten thousand. From Ib to Asshai, when men see my sails, they pray."
name: Euron Crow's Eye
text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you marshal Euron Crow's Eye, search your hand, deck, and discard pile for Silence and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

flavor: "If there are rocks to starboard and a storm to port, a wise captain steers a third course."
name: Asha Greyjoy
text: Pillage. Stealth. Each other unique Ironborn character you control gains stealth.

flavor: "The Knight took Grimston by himself. He planted his standard beneath the castle and defied the Grimms to face him. One did, and then another, and another. He slew them all..." <cite>Hotho Harlaw</cite>
name: The Knight
text: No attachments except Weapon. While The Knight is attacking alone, he gains stealth and renown.

flavor: "Mine is the strength of the sea, a strength the Crow's Eye cannot hope to withstand."
name: Aeron Damphair
text: Insight. Reaction: After another Drowned God character you control is killed, draw a card. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "Where is it written that our king must be a kraken?"
name: The Drumm
text: While The Drumm is attacking in a [military] or [power] challenge, each character with an [intrigue] icon cannot be declared as a defender.

flavor: Long years had passed since then, but still the widow lingered, grieving, and muttering from time to time that the castle should be hers.
name: Gwynesse Harlaw
text: Action: Choose 3 cards in an opponent's discard pile and place them on the bottom of his or her deck in any order. Then, gain 1 gold and draw 1 card. (Limit once per round.)

name: Andrik the Unsmiling
text: Pillage. Reaction: After Andrik the Unsmiling discards a card using pillage, choose a non-limited location or attachment in the losing opponent's discard pile. Discard 1 copy of that card from play.

flavor: Qarl stood over him, with his long-sword dripping and moonlight shining in his eyes.
name: Qarl the Maid
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Qarl the Maid is participating, either: stand a Warship location, or stand Asha Greyjoy.

flavor: "Pray all you wish... It does not change the laws."
name: Maester Murenmure
text: Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered location ability would initiate, kneel Maester Murenmure to cancel those effects.

flavor: "...even the Old Grey Gull has left that rock he lives on to preach this kingsmoot all across Harlaw." <cite>The Reader</cite>
name: Old Grey Gull
text: Action: Kneel Old Grey Gull to kill another [greyjoy] character you control. Then, you may return that character from your dead pile to your hand.

name: Priest of Old Wyk
text: While there is a Drowned God character in your dead pile, Priest of Old Wyk contributes its STR to your total for dominance even while kneeling.

name: Drowned Prophet
text: Interrupt: When Drowned Prophet is killed, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a [greyjoy] character and place it in your dead pile. Shuffle your deck.

name: Eager Deckhand
text: Reaction: After a Warship location enters play under your control, put Eager Deckhand into play from your hand.

name: Orkmont Reaver
text:
Pillage.
While an opponent has 10 or more cards in his or her discard pile, Orkmont Reaver gains stealth.

name: Silence
text: Challenges Action: Kneel Silence to put a Warship location into play from your hand. Then, if you control Euron Crow's Eye, stand him. +2 Initiative.

flavor: Great Wyk was the largest of the Iron Islands, so vast that some of its lords had holdings that did not front upon the holy sea.
name: Great Wyk
text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Golden Storm
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, kneel Golden Storm to choose and kill a participating character. Then, if you control a participating Raider character, stand Golden Storm.

name: Maiden's Bane
text: Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge, kneel Maiden's Bane to choose and stand an attacking character. Then, if that character is a Captain, stand Maiden's Bane.

name: Scouting Vessel
text: Interrupt: When a character you control discards a card using pillage, kneel and sacrifice Scouting Vessel to discard 3 cards instead.

name: Red Rain
text: Unique [greyjoy] character only. If attached character is The Drumm, he gains stealth. Reaction: After you win an unopposed challenge in which attached character is attacking, it gains 2 power. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Fleet Captain
text: Attached character gains the Captain trait and gets +1 STR. (+3 STR instead if you control 3 or more Warship locations.)

name: What Is Dead May Never Die
text: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a [greyjoy] character in your dead pile and put it into play.

name: Nighttime Raid
text: Action: Choose up to 3 characters with pillage and/or the Raider trait. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters gains stealth.

flavor: "This was well done, Khorane. You will be having a fine reward, I am thinking." <cite>Salladhor Saan</cite>
name: Khorane Sathmantes
text: Action: Kneel Khorane Sathmantes and a Warship location to choose and kneel 1 character and 1 location.

name: Fury
text: While you control Stannis Baratheon, he gains intimidate. Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, kneel Fury to choose a character or location. Move 1 power from that card to your faction card.

flavor: "The gold of a lowland lord is as worthless as a half man's promises"
name: Gunthor Son of Gurn
text: Ambush (4). Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Gunthor Son of Gurn is attacking, the losing opponent must choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand.

flavor: "...and a mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge."
name: My Mind is My Weapon
text: Action: During a [military] challenge, choose a character you control with an [intrigue] icon and have it participate in the challenge on your side.

designer: Card design by 2012 European Melee Champion, Istvan Cserdi.
name: Desert Raider
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, put Desert Raider into play from your dead pile and choose a character controlled by the winning opponent. That character gains 1 power. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an [intrigue] or [power] icon and Desert Raider gains that icon.

flavor: The most powerful of the Dornish lords was Anders Yronwood, the Bloodroyal...
name: The Bloodroyal
text:
[martell] character only.
While you are not the first player, attached character gains stealth and renown.

name: Vindictive Ranger
text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, Vindictive Ranger gains stealth and a challenge icon of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Westwatch-by-the-Bridge
text: Action: Kneel Westwatch-by-the-Bridge to choose and stand another [thenightswatch] location with printed cost 1 or lower. (Printed cost 4 or lower instead if you control a Ranger character, a Steward character, and a Builder character.)

flavor: "My lady, is there aught I might do for you?"
name: Maester Vyman
text: Reaction: After you win a [military] or [power] challenge, kneel Maester Vyman to choose another character that shares a Trait with him. That character gains 1 power.

flavor: "Karhold is with me, that is all the men need know." <cite>Stannis Baratheon</cite>
name: Karhold
text: While a player does not have a Winter plot card revealed, characters and locations he or she controls cannot gain power.

flavor: And old Cohollo - Cohollo who had bound his life to Drogo's on the day of his birth, Cohollo who had always been kind to her - Cohollo spat full in her face.
name: Cohollo
text: Intimidate. Action: Kneel Cohollo and discard 1 card from your hand to have him participate in a challenge on your side.

flavor: A haunting ballad of two dying lovers amidst the Doom of Valyria might have pleased the hall more if Collio had not sung it in High Valyrian, which most of the guests could not speak.
name: "Dance of the Dragons"
text: Action: Choose a non-event card with printed cost 3 or lower in your discard pile and return it to your hand.

flavor: Young Serry had been different. A brave man, thought Victarion. Almost ironborn.
name: Ser Talbert Serry
text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After an opponent triggers a location ability, Ser Talbert Serry gets +2 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit 3 times per phase.)

flavor: Though the men of the Shield Islands called themselves sailors, they crossed the seas in dread and went lightly clad in battle for fear of drowning.
name: The Shield Islands
text: Increase the number of cards each player draws in the draw phase by 1.

name: Bronze Yohn Royce
text: Renown. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Bronze Yohn Royce is defending, kneel a neutral location with printed cost 1 or higher to stand him. (Limit twice per phase.)

name: Rogue Wildling
text: Ambush (5). Reaction: After Rogue Wildling enters play, choose and stand a Wildling character you control.

name: Citadel Archivist
text: Reaction: After Citadel Archivist enters your discard pile, each player shuffles his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

name: The Starry Sept
text: Action: Move 1 power from The Starry Sept to a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). Reaction: After you win a [power] challenge, The Starry Sept gains 1 power.

name: Reckless
text:
Terminal.
Attached character must be declared as an attacker or defender in each challenge, if able.

designer: Card design by 2008 Melee World Champion, Tzu-Mainn Chen.
name: When I Woke...
text: Reaction: After a player loses a [military] challenge, that player chooses a participating character and places it on top of its owner's deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)

name: Sea of Blood
text: During [military] challenges, reduce the cost of each event you play by 1 for each blood token on Sea of Blood. You cannot play events during [intrigue] or [power] challenges. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to place a blood token on Sea of Blood. Then, search your deck for an event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: We Take Westeros!
text: When Revealed: Choose a location in a discard pile and put it into play under your control.

name: Return to the Fields
text: When Revealed: You may sacrifice up to 3 characters. For each character sacrificed this way, draw 1 card and gain 1 gold.

name: Heir to the Iron Throne
text: When Revealed: Search the top 10 cards of your deck for a Lord or Lady character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. Then, sacrifice a Lord or Lady character.

name: Coordinated Attack
text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, choose a different challenge type. You may initiate an additional challenge of the chosen type this phase. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Stolen Message
text: Each opponent plays with the top card of his or her deck revealed. Action: Pay 1 gold to place the top card of an opponent's deck on the bottom of that player's deck. (Limit 3 times per round.)

name: Secrets of the Conclave
text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Add 1 to your hand, discard 1, and put the others back on top of your deck in any order.

name: Vanquish the Unbelievers
text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a Trait. Kill each character you control that does not have that Trait (cannot be saved).
